sharedContent.title:
Twitter is working on Super Follows application

Requirements:
- Have at least 10000 followers
- Have posted at least 25 Tweets in past 30 days
- Be at least 18 years old

notably, â€œAdult contentâ€ and â€œOnlyFansâ€ are mentioned in the category and platform sections https://t.co/qSEjh0ohm8 https://t.co/yvkzx672V2
